reviewText: One of my personal favorites of what just might happen to those who dare to stay in a haunted house and are never heard from again.

Worthless Piece of etc.
I have endured some bad movies in hopes of them getting better or having a redeeming ending but this movie takes the cake (of cow dung) It purports to be of an aspiring student making a film that will land him in a cinema class,but his shaky,wobbly, hand held techniques only serve to induce head aches and boredom in the unlucky viewer. Majority of the film (using the term very loosely) is in a dark  old mansion,if the rotting wood and paint peeling walls would be edited out the film would be about 30 minutes shorter, actually this is not a bad suggestion for the director/editor should he ever make another attempt at a decent product. I will try to remember his name so I can avoid future efforts. Dont even rent it if you have anything, like napping, better to do.
This was a real good one also, and also nicely priced for used CD!! I would reccommend it very highly!!
This film was great! More funny than scary... Great Indie horror and wouldn't be suprised if it ends up in theaters.
